AND types in three characters

THEN search results are displayed in dropdown
AND letters entered will be bold in results

title: Display of search results
custom_preconds: GIVEN user wants to quicksearch a player
custom_steps: WHEN the user types in 3 characters in search results
custom_expected:
THEN the results will display as follows: 
 -Highlight in bold the section of the suggestion that matches the user's search criteria 
 -Display at the top any matches closest to last name, followed by those closest to first name and Roster name matches 
 -Matches displayed should then be sorted alphabetically based on Last name, then Roster name and then First name

title: Move MJC through stateflow for player that is a Free Agent - Active Pending Contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is CLUB ADMIN or BOC ADMIN 
AND is viewing a MAJOR CONTRACT for a player who is free agent
AND the player's current status is free agent
custom_steps:
WHEN Contract is moved from 'Ready for Signature' -> Pending Approval
OR Contract is moved from 'Ready for Signature' → 'Ready for Signature (Terms Confirmed)'
OR contract is moved from 'Terms Submitted' → 'Terms Confirmed'
custom_expected:
THEN contract status should be updated to Free Agent (Active)
AND system should generate a signed FA transaction to place that player on the signing team's roster
AND if the player's latest Sign Free Agent transaction's Report Date is empty and the current date is in the baseball season, or the Report Date is after the effective date of the Sign Free Agent transaction, then system should set the Player's MJ Roster Status to Not Yet Reported and the transaction history record's Post MJ Roster Status to Not Yet Reported
BUT otherwise system should  set the Player's MJ Roster Status to Active and the transaction history record's Post MJ Roster Status to Active

title: Move MJC through stateflow for player that is a Free Agent - NOT Active Pending Contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club admin user from any org, or BOC admin user views Major contract for a player who is free agent
AND the player's current status is NOT Active Pending Contract
custom_steps:
WHEN Contract is moved from Ready for Signature -> Pending Approval
OR Contract is moved from Ready for Signature → Ready for Signature (Terms Confirmed)
OR contract is moved from Terms Submitted → Terms Confirmed
custom_expected:
THEN contract status should be updated
AND system should generate a signed FA transaction in Submit to BOC state and effective date equal to the contract's Confirmed Date, or Signing Date if there is no Confirmed Date

title: As a BOC admin I want to run the Contract Expiration batch
custom_steps:
Business Value: User can begin batch that will expire all Major League contracts that have exhausted their guaranteed and exercised options years up to the Max Yr Expired value. 

See Batch Parameters: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2298076

Batch Rules: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=1278202

Acceptance Criteria:
*NOTE: We will ONLY be deliver the MJ Contract portion of this batch with this story. The Employee Contract options will come later and could potentially just be a separate batch.*

* "Contract Expiration Batch" is a batch option under the "Major Contracts" section on the batch screen.
* Clicking "Contract Expiration Batch" opens the batch in the batch screen. 
* The batch parameters display per the batch requirements. 
* A "Run" button is available. 
* Clicking "Run" will run the batch according to the selected parameters. 
* When the batch is run: 
     - Get approved contracts to be expired (contracts in their last year)
     - Iterate over contracts
     - If there are no options - expire the contract
     - If the last year is an option year - expire the contract only if none of the options are exercised
     - Any players' whose contracts were expired and have contracts that were in "Approved for Next Year" state are updated to "Approved" state
     - If any of the contracts being moved to an "Approved" state overlap with a current Approved contract, then update the status of the existing Approved contract to "Superseded" 
* Results will only include players' who had a contract updated by the batch and should display in the "Batch Results" widget. Available columns should be Errors, Player ID, Name (Last, Roster), Org (Player's current Org), Contract ID, Signing Org (Org contract is with), 
Start Year, Non Option Yrs, Option Yrs, Status (Contract Status), Type (Contract Type (MJ or EE))
* Batch run information should display in the batch history widget.

title: As a BOC admin I want to run the MJ Award Bonus Batch
custom_preconds: GIVEN "MJC Award Bonus Batch" is a batch option under the "Major Contracts" section on the batch screen
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "MJC Award Bonus Batch"
custom_expected:
THEN system should open the batch in the batch screen 
AND the batch parameters should display per the batch requirements
AND a "Run" button should be available
AND clicking "Run" should run the batch according to the selected parameters
AND when the batch is run system should: 
    - Get Contracts with Award Bonus Terms, Salary Escalators and Conditional Options that are currently in an Approved, Update Approved, Expired or Approved for Next Year status that contain a contract with an Award Bonus or criteria that is not yet marked official
    - Iterate over contacts containing awards
    - Process Award 
    - Check for bonus terms and place finished values
    - Update salaries/earned amounts as necessary
    - Calculate Vesting Options
    - Calculate LRD Present Values
    - Calculate Bonus Maximums
    - Calculate LRD Salary
    - Calculate Total Guaranteed 
    - Set offered and earned bonus amounts
    - Save contract
AND results should only include players who had a contract updated by the batch and should display in the "Batch Results" widget
AND available columns should be Player ID, Player's Name, Org, Club, and Roster Status
AND batch run information should display in the batch history widget.

title: As a BOC admin I want to running the MJ Award Bonus Batch to generate notifications
custom_preconds: GIVEN a BOC user is attempting to run the MJ Award Bonus Batch
custom_steps: WHEN user runs the batch in Update Mode
custom_expected:
THEN a notification should be generated for any clause that is updated
AND if an award bonus is marked earned, Notification #1 should be generated for the BOC MJC Admin and the Club MJC Admin that the player is currently signed with
AND if a salary escalator with an award criteria is marked earned, Notification #3 should be generated for the BOC MJC Admin and the Club MJC Admin that the player is currently signed with 
AND if an Option with an award criteria is marked earned, Notification #6 should be generated for the BOC MJC Admin and the Club MJC Admin that the player is currently signed with
